sentence.text: RHOA, transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway, transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway, SMAD5, negative regulation of SMAD protein complex assembly, BMPR1A, SMAD7 and negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II-, which thereby emerge as candidate genes to play an important role in CRC tumor metastasis
